# simmedd

Simulating metabolic disease dynamics, or simmedd, is the start of a project to 
create simulations on how metabolilc diseases operate in a population. This section
will be filled out as we develop the project.

Please note that this project is released with a [Contributor Code of Conduct](CONDUCT.md). 
By participating in this project you agree to abide by its terms.
